category.name: Stone Grinding Discs
category.path: Cutting Tools\Cutting and Grinding Discs\Stone Grinding Discs

category_idosell.path: Cutting Tools\Cutting and Grinding Discs\Stone Grinding Discs

description.name: Diamond Turbo Row Cup Wheel 5mm 125x22,2mm
description.long_desc:
Diamond Cup Wheel ideal for grinding concrete, masonry and a variety of other applications. The turbo rim design provides faster material removal and a smooth finish.


Product Features



  • Ideal for use on concrete and masonry

  • Fast and aggressive grinding

  • Hardened steel body

  • Can be used wet or dry

  • Optimized hole pattern for fast dust removal

  • Compatible with 22,23mm bore angle grinders


Technical Data



  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Hole Size: 22,23 mm

  • Diamond Segment Height: 5 mm

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 12200

description.name: Diamond Turbo Row Cup Wheel 5mm 125xM14
description.long_desc:
Diamond Cup Wheel ideal for grinding concrete, masonry and a variety of other applications. The turbo rim design provides faster material removal and a smooth finish.


Product Features



  • Ideal for use on concrete and masonry

  • Fast and aggressive grinding

  • Hardened steel body

  • Can be used wet or dry

  • Optimized hole pattern for fast dust removal

  • Compatible with angle grinders with M14 thread


Technical Data



  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Thread Size: M14

  • Diamond Segment Height: 5 mm

description.name: Diamond Grinding Wheel for CTC Saw Blades 125x10x32x8mm
description.long_desc:
GEKO Premium Diamond Grinding Wheel for circular saw blade sharpening machines. Suitable for circular saw blades from 80 - 700 mm.


Technical Data



  • Disc Diameter: 125 mm

  • Bore Size: 32 mm

  • Diamond Layer Thickness: 8 mm

  • Grit Size: fine to medium

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 2800
description.short_desc:
GEKO Premium Diamond Grinding Wheel for circular saw blade sharpening machines. Suitable for circular saw blades from 80 - 700 mm.

  • Maximum Speed [rpm]: 2800

description.name: Tile Leveling, Aligning and Spacer Wedges Part B (50pcs)
description.long_desc:
Second part of a 2-part system to level, align, space and hold porcelain, marble and stone tiles during installation



  • Produces 1,5mm grout joint

  • Injection molded plastic wedges with locking ribs on top

  • Use with tiles up to 12mm thick

  • Save time while providing level and consistently spaced tiles

  • Wedges can be reused for multiple tile installation projects

  • Use with Part A of 2-part system (not included)

  • Pack of 50 pieces
description.short_desc:
Second part of a 2-part system to level, align, space and hold porcelain, marble and stone tiles during installation



  • Produces 1,5mm grout joint

  • Injection molded plastic wedges with locking ribs on top

  • Use with tiles up to 12mm thick

  • Save time while providing level and consistently spaced tiles

  • Wedges can be reused for multiple tile installation projects

  • Use with Part A of 2-part system (not included)

  • Pack of 50 pieces
description.description:

description.name: Switch for grinding machine
description.long_desc:
A push switch for grinder 230 that can be locked in the on position.


Electrical joints: 4x twisted joints


Dimensions:



  • outer length (with button): 50 mm

  • outer width: 25 + 15 (blockade) mm

  • external height: 41 mm

  • switch lock dimensions: button - 7 mm, button guide -10 mm

  • switch key: 12 x 25 mm

  • switch cube: 25 x 41 mm

description.name: Switch for grinding machine
description.long_desc:
A toggle switch, movable for a 115 mm and 125 mm disc grinder.


It fits, among others: grinders BT-AG500, DK2P4, BWS 115-580, FA2-5 / 2F.


Electrical joints: 4x twisted joints (2 lines attached).


Dimensions:



  • slider: 11 x 7.5 mm

  • outer length with zipper: 39 mm

  • outer width: 20.5 mm

  • outer height with handle: 37.5 mm
description.short_desc:

description.name: Switch 115B /type 125 ferm/
description.long_desc:
2-position toggle switch 0-1 stable for 5A grinder.


It fits, among others: DKP4-11 grinders, Skil 9003, 9371, 9376, 115B grinders/type 125 FERM.


Electrical joints: 4x twisted joint.


Dimensions:



  • outer length: 31 mm

  • outer width: 20 mm

  • outer height with lever: 44 mm

description.name: Switch for Ferm drill
description.long_desc:
Push-button switch for FERM drill. It has speed regulation, right/left rotation direction regulation, and a switch lock in the permanent on position.


Electrical joints of the button module: 2x twisted + 2x quick couplers


Electrical joints of the direction of rotation switch: 4x quick couplers


Dimensions:



  • outer length (with direction lever and lock button): 80 mm

  • outer width: 17mm + 17mm (lock)

  • outer height (with direction lever): 50 mm

  • switch key: 39 x 13 x 29 mm

  • diameter of the lock button: 11 mm

  • speed control knob diameter: 15 mm

description.name: Switch for grinding machine 230mm
description.long_desc:
Push switch for grinder 230 mm. It has a slider built into the main button to prevent accidental pressing.


Electrical joints: 4x twisted joint.


Dimensions:



  • outer length: 56 mm (with button)

  • outer width: 26.5 mm

  • outer height: 75 mm

  • switch key: 61 x 11.5 x 23 mm

  • lock dimensions: 17 x 6 mm

description.name: Switch for two-speed drill
description.long_desc:
Push-button switch with speed control, reverse rotation right/left, and switch lock in the permanent ON position.


In the permanent ON position, the speed depends on the setting of the knob in the main button.


Electrical connectors of the button module: 2x twisted + 2x quick couplers


Electrical connections of the direction of rotation switch: 4x quick couplers


Dimensions:



  • outer length (with button and direction lever): 79 mm

  • outer width (+ lock button): 17 + 16 mm

  • external height: 47 mm

  • switch key: 46 x 21 x 27 mm

  • diameter of the lock button: 11 mm

  • speed knob diameter: 18 mm

In the permanent ON position, the speed depends on the setting of the knob in the main button.

description.long_desc:
Gear train for Bosch 230 mm GWS



  • Outer diameter of the large wheel - 81.5 mm

  • The hole for the spindle of the large wheel - 14 mm

  • The height of the wheel measured in the hole for the spindle / the entire rack - 15/20 mm

  • The number of teeth of the large wheel - 37

  • The outer diameter of the small circle - 18.5 mm

  • The hole for the axis of the small wheel rotor - 9 mm

  • The height of the entire rack of the small wheel - 15 mm

  • The width / depth of the note of a small circle - 10/4 mm

  • The number of teeth of the small wheel - 9

  • Otwór na wrzeciono dużego koła - 14 mm z nutą na klin 4 mm
  • Wysokość koła mierzona w otworze na wrzeciono / całej zębatki - 15/20 mm
  • Liczba zębów dużego koła - 37
  • Średnica zewnętrzna małego koła - 18,5 mm
  • Otwór na oś wirnika małego koła - 8 mm
  • Wysokość całej zębatki małego koła - 15 mm
  • Szerokość / głębokość nuty małego koła - 10/4 mm
  • Liczba zębów małego koła - 9
